name: Consumed By Fire
description:
Made for the GMTK GAME JAM. Is work in progress.

Click on near by objects to set them on fire. Aim is to set everything on fire as quickly as possible. Best of luck.

Audio Credit: Blastwave FX - Barn fire, blaze, internal recording, crackles and spitting of burning wood (https://www.zapsplat.com/music/barn-fire-blaze-internal-recording-crackles-and-spitting-of-burning-wood/)
